dishes.name: Classic Cheeseburger
dishes.description: Juicy beef patty with melted American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a brioche bun.

dishes.name: Bacon Avocado Burger
dishes.description: Premium beef patty topped with crispy bacon, fresh avocado, lettuce, and chipotle mayo.

dishes.name: Buddha Bowl
dishes.description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, avocado, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Wrap
dishes.description: Hummus, falafel, cucumber, tomato, and tzatziki wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken
dishes.description: Tender chicken in a rich tomato and butter sauce with aromatic spices. Served with basmati rice.

dishes.name: Vegetable Biryani
dishes.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

dishes.name: Dragon Roll Combo
dishes.description: Signature Dragon Roll with avocado and eel, plus a California Roll. Served with miso soup.

dishes.name: Bento Box
dishes.description: Assorted sushi, teriyaki chicken, vegetable tempura, and seaweed salad.

dishes.name: Supreme Pizza
dishes.description: Loaded with pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms on our hand-tossed crust.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil on a thin, crispy crust.

dishes.name: Street Taco Platter
dishes.description: Four authentic street-style tacos with your choice of meat, topped with onions, cilantro, and lime.

dishes.name: Loaded Nachos
dishes.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with queso, seasoned beef, beans, jalapeños, guacamole, and sour cream.

dishes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
dishes.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

dishes.name: New York Cheesecake
dishes.description: Classic creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and berry compote.

dishes.name: Spicy Ramen
dishes.description: Rich vegetable broth with ramen noodles, marinated tofu, soft-boiled egg (omit for vegan), bamboo shoots, and spicy miso paste.

dishes.name: Pad Thai
dishes.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, eggs, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

dishes.name: Bibimbap
dishes.description: Steamed rice topped with assorted vegetables, bulgogi beef, and a fried egg.

dishes.name: Korean Fried Chicken
dishes.description: Crispy double-fried chicken tossed in a sweet and spicy gochujang glaze.

dishes.name: Coq au Vin
dishes.description: Slow-cooked chicken in a rich red wine sauce with mushrooms and pearl onions.

dishes.name: Crème Brûlée
dishes.description: Silky vanilla custard topped with a caramelized sugar crust.
